name: Snake 3D (itch) (Foolish)
description:
My submission for Mix and Game Jam.  The theme being dimension change I wanted to recreate the classic Snake game in 3D. I placed the main camera on top of the snake to create a 3rd person  point of view.

How to play:

- Use the 'A' , 'D' or LEFT and RIGHT arrows to move left and right

- Use 'W' or the UP arrow to move faster

- Collect food and avoid your tail and walls

Have fun!
